entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 late this afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
